chapters.title: Chapter 44: The Color of Trust
chapters.info: Aludra, p. 559 (784)—Slender former Illuminator that Mat and Thom saved from other Illuminators when they were traveling through Aringill. She was cast out of the Illuminators' Guild because she was blamed for spoiling the fireworks display for King Galldrian of Cairhien. The problem was actually Tammuz's fault (or so they thought), but she was a more convenient target. The mishap for Galldrian was actually caused by Rand al'Thor. Aludra later hooked up with Valan Luca's menagerie to do fireworks displays for him.
